Treatment facility 1

Treatment date

You can only apply for a PRC from the time treatment is needed. This includes treatment that has already taken place.

A PRC will last for 28 days starting from the first day of treatment. If the treatment lasts for longer than 28 days, you will need to reapply.

You cannot apply for a PRC in advance.
